thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: Roy Langford
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Roy Langford

author: Roy Langford
title: Roy Langford
text: pretty killer company. i did end up with some serious hassle of not being allowed to authorize leaving a lens on my isolated house porch; but that's a minor quibble. i trust that i am getting genuine gear and with photography equipment most of the prices are basically fixed for the most part. amazon lately has too many fraudulent products and the best part is B&H saves me on the sales tax.
